text: <@U07P1L27G5N> <@U05ABQULENT> we should get the POD signed up for this!

:wave: Hi everyone! We're working on an embedded Tableau dashboard for our HubSpot hosted site (<http://ridecircuit.com|ridecircuit.com>) using Tableau's guidance for how to <https://help.tableau.com/current/online/en-us/connected_apps_eas.htm|Configure Connected Apps with OAuth2.0>. In our use-case, we want to create an app where account management and user permissions are managed by <https://help.tableau.com/current/online/en-us/connected_apps_eas.htm#step-2-register-your-eas-with--tableau-cloud|AuthO, acting as the EAS> for Tableau, and we have registered it with Tableau

However, we are receiving <https://help.tableau.com/current/online/en-us/connected_apps_troubleshoot.htm#:~:text=10098,or%20encrypted%20JWT.|a 10098 error from Tableau>, suggesting that our JWT for the embed view is not formatted correctly or we're missing a parameter in the token itself. 2 questions as a result:

1. Any thoughts on specific HubSpot settings that need to be enabled? 
2. Should we be <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/creating-an-app|registering our app in HubSpot, as a public app>, and pointing both Tableau and our IdP  (Auth0) to the public app's respective client info in Hubppot?

:sparkles:Slack Tips and Best Practices:sparkles:

To get the most out the HubSpot Developer Slack, follow these best practices:

• Will your post/question potentially help more than one person? Ask in a public channel instead of 1:1 DMs to help as many folks as possible. 
• Thread all replies to keep topics organized and searchable
• Thread followup questions/comments to your original post
• Don't post the same question in multiple channels. If you must, link to your original question in new channels.
More <https://slack.com/blog/collaboration/etiquette-tips-in-slack|great tips here>. Thanks for making the HubSpot Developer Slack easier to use for everyone!
We are moving old drag/drop website modules and templates into a theme. How do we test things like the site search page and functionality in Content Staging?
